column.name: video_id
column.definition: INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT
column.label: Video ID
column.description: The ID number assigned to the video. ID numbers are generated in sequential order automatically by the software.

column.name: username
column.label: Username
column.description: The username of the account that uploaded the video

column.name: title
column.label: Title
column.description: The title that has been assigned to the video

validator.message: The Title field is required

column.name: description
column.label: Description
column.description: The description that has been assigned to the video

validator.message: The Description field is required

column.name: tags
column.label: Tags
column.description: The tags that have been assigned to the video

column.name: date_added
column.label: Date Added
column.description: The date and time the video was added to the database

validator.message: The Date Added field is required
The Date Added field is not a properly formatted date and time value

column.name: date_recorded
column.label: Date Recorded
column.description: The date the video was recorded

validator.message: The Date Recorded field is not a properly formatted date value

column.name: location_recorded
column.label: Location Recorded
column.description: The location where the video was recorded

column.name: status
column.label: Status
column.description: The status of the video

column.name: duration
column.label: Duration
column.description: The length of the video, in seconds
column.notes: The total duration of all the clips

column.name: category_id
column.label: Category
column.description: The category in which this video appears

column.name: sponsor_id
column.label: Sponsor
column.description: The sponsor from which this video comes

column.name: is_private
column.label: Make this video private
column.description: Indicates if this video should be private

column.name: is_featured
column.label: Make this video featured
column.description: Indicates if this video should be a featured video

column.name: date_last_featured
column.label: Date Last Featured
column.description: The date and time the video was last featured

column.name: num_thumbnails
column.label: # of Thumbnails
column.description: The number of thumbnail images available for this video

column.name: display_thumbnail
column.label: Display Thumbnail
column.description: The thumbnail image from the video to display while browsing videos

column.name: allow_comments
column.definition: ENUM('No','Yes - Add Immediately','Yes - Require Approval') NOT NULL
column.label: Comments Allowed
column.description: Indicates if comments are allowed for this video

column.name: allow_ratings
column.label: Allow ratings
column.description: Indicates if ratings are allowed for this video

column.name: allow_embedding
column.label: Allow embedding
column.description: Indicates if this video can be embedded in remote sites

column.name: is_user_submitted
column.label: User Submitted
column.description: Indicates if this video was submitted by an end-user

column.name: conversion_failed
column.label: Conversion Failed
column.description: Indicates if this video conversion failed

column.name: clip_id
column.definition: INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT

column.name: thumbnail_id
column.definition: INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT

column.name: thumbnail
column.notes: The relative or full URL to the video thumbnail

column.name: video_id
column.definition: INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY
